title: HACK THE LADDER
description: Climb your way to the top by solving complex coding challenges. Compete against the best and prove your skills in this ultimate coding battle!

title: BUG HUNT
description: Think like a tester, debug like a pro! Find and fix hidden errors in the given code within a time limit. The one who catches the most bugs wins!

title: NETWORKING
description: Show off your networking knowledge! Solve real-world networking problems, design secure architectures, and prove you're the networking expert!

title: CODECRAZE
description: A thrilling coding competition where logic meets creativity. Solve algorithmic puzzles, optimize your code, and challenge your limits!

title: TECH BLAST
description: A rapid-fire quiz that tests your knowledge of emerging technologies, groundbreaking innovations, and futuristic trends. Stay sharp and get ready to blast through a series of challenging tech questions!

title: TECH O TECH
description: Step into a world filled with cutting-edge technology! This event brings you hands-on experience with the latest gadgets, software, and AI-driven solutions. Dive deep into the tech revolution!

title: PICK THE BID
description: A thrilling auction-style event where participants bid on tech-related products, innovations, and concepts. Use your analytical skills and strategy to make the smartest bids and win big!

title: TECH DEBATE
description: A high-intensity debate where participants tackle the most pressing tech-related controversies. AI ethics, cybersecurity, blockchain â€“ get ready to voice your opinions and challenge the competition!
